Module GUIs
Package GUIs

Class TruckerRole

java.lang.Object
GUIs.TruckerRole
public class TruckerRole extends Object
TruckerRole class provides methods to view trucker's current jobs, input Job Data, and generate weekly summary.
Author:
Naery Kouyoumjian

    • inputLoadData

      public void inputLoadData(int jobID, String startLocation, String endLocation, boolean paid, String status, Date completionTime, int jobHours, String notes)
      Method to input information about a job
      Parameters:
      jobID - the job ID
      startLocation - where the GUIs.Job begins
      endLocation - where the GUIs.Job ends
      paid - whether the job has been paid
      status - current status of the load
      completionTime - the date when the job was completed
      jobHours - amount of hours this GUIs.Job will take to complete
      notes - any extra information
